differential_diagnosis: Mental disorders secondary to intracranial infection
Sleep disorder related to psychomotor seizures
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: Initial symptoms included insomnia, limb pain, dizziness, nausea, ataxia, and bizarre sleep behaviors. Progressive neurological symptoms and confirmatory toxicology studies revealed alarmingly high mercury levels from herbal decoctions. The leading differential diagnosis shifted to a toxin-related disorder, specifically mercury poisoning, supported by test results showing high mercury concentrations.
